column2: A Vampire Clan has taken root in §Y[Root.GetName]§! leading to severe unrest amongst the local populace.
A pack of werewolves have entered §Y[Root.GetName]§!, they terrorise the local populace each night leading to unrest and disruption of the local economy.
A large number of Kikimoras settled in the swamps near §Y[Root.GetName]§!.
Hellhounds are haunting the countryside near §Y[Root.GetName]§!.
A large number of Rotfiends appeared near §Y[Root.GetName]§!.
Drowners have infeted the lakes and rivers near §Y[Root.GetName]§!.
A large number of Nekkers appeared in the caves near §Y[Root.GetName]§!.
